template.name: Customer Acquisition Report
template.description: Lists new customers in specified period by Location and Account Type

template.name: Customer Balance Report
template.description: Shows customers with non-zero balances as at the specified Statement Date

template.name: Customer List Report
template.description: Shows customers grouped by Practice Location & Account Type

template.name: Customer Payments Report
template.description: Lists customer payments and refunds between the specified dates

template.name: Customer Product Sales Report
template.description: Lists the selected products sold in given period to selected customers

template.name: Customer Reconciliation Report
template.description: Displays the selected customer's transactions for the specified period

template.name: Customer Referral Report
template.description: Shows number of customers for each Referred By name

template.name: Customer Retention Report
template.description: Shows retained and lost customers by comparing their activity in two periods

template.name: Customer Running Balance Report
template.description: Shows the customer's transactions between the specified dates

template.name: Customer Sales Report
template.description: Lists customer sales and adjustment transactions in the specified period

template.name: Duplicate Customers/Patients Report
template.description: Finds Duplicate Customers & Patients using the selected criteria

template.name: Duplicate Customers/Patients subreport
template.description: Subreport - Duplicate Customers & Patients

template.name: Estimates Report
template.description: Lists estimates in specified period

template.name: Estimates Report subreport
template.description: Subreport for Estimates Report

template.name: Export Customer Addresses for Sales
template.description: Export Addresses of customers/patients with sales in date range of selected products

template.name: Export Customer Addresses
template.description: Export Addresses of selected customers/patients

template.name: Export Customer Email Addresses for Sales
template.description: Export Email Addresses of customers/patients with sales in date range of selected products
template.path: Reporting/Reports/Customer/A4/Export Customer Email Addresses for Sales.jrxml

template.name: Export Customer Email Addresses
template.description: Export Email Addresses of selected customers/patients

template.name: Export Customer Phone Numbers for Sales
template.description: Export Phone numbers of customers/patients with sales in date range of selected products
template.path: Reporting/Reports/Customer/A4/Export Customer Phone Numbers for Sales.jrxml

template.name: Export Customer Phone Numbers
template.description: Export Phone numbers of selected customers/patients

template.name: Task Time Statistics
template.description: Displays statistics for worklist task times

template.name: Wait Time Statistics
template.description: Displays statistics for appointment wait times

template.name: Clinician Sales Report
template.description: Shows sales data by clinician and optionally by location, product type, and product

template.name: Debtors - Current
template.description: Provides the current debtors position at the time the report was run

template.name: Debtors - Current - SubReport1
template.description: Debtors - Current - SubReport1

template.name: Debtors - Historical
template.description: Provides the debtors position at any specified date

template.name: Key Performance Indicators
template.description: Shows 40 KPI numbers for a specified period and up to 3 prior periods

template.name: Practice Clinician Sales Report
template.description: Shows sales data by clinician and location using item, transaction and includes metrics

template.name: Practice Summary
template.description: Prints various practice statistics for a specified period

template.name: Practice Sum. Count Appointments by Clinician
template.description: Practice Sum. Count Appointments by Clinician

template.name: Practice Sum. Count Appointments by Type
template.description: Practice Sum. Count Appointments by Type

template.name: Practice Sum. Count Visits by Clinician
template.description: Practice Sum. Count Visits by Clinician

template.name: Practice Sum. Count Visits by Location
template.description: Practice Sum. Count Visits by Location

template.name: Practice Sum. Income by Clinician
template.description: Practice Sum. Income by Clinician

template.name: Practice Sum. Income by Location
template.description: Practice Sum. Income by Location

template.name: Practice Sum. Outstanding Debtors
template.description: Practice Sum. Outstanding Debtors

template.name: Practice Sum. Payments by Location
template.description: Practice Sum. Payments by Location

template.name: Practice Sum. Poduct Sales by Location
template.description: Practice Sum. Poduct Sales by Location

template.name: Practice Sum. Poduct Sales by Type
template.description: Practice Sum. Poduct Sales by Type

template.name: Patient Acquisition Report
template.description: Shows patients acquired between the specified dates and their owners

template.name: Patient Deceased Report
template.description: Lists patients deceased in specified date range with owner and chip/tag details

template.name: Patient History Search
template.description: Finds notes with specified text with date range, species, breed and clinician selection

template.name: Patient List Report
template.description: Lists owner and patient details with DOB, species and breed selection

template.name: Patient Sales Alert Check
template.description: List patients who do not have product related sales alerts set

template.name: Patient Sterilisation Report
template.description: Lists desexed patients with DOB in specified range

template.name: Product Batch Use Report
template.description: Shows usage of products having batch information with product, manufacturer and batch selection

template.name: Product List Report
template.description: Lists products with selection by name, product type, classification, alert and pricing group

template.name: Product Price List Report
template.description: Lists prices as at a date with selection by name, product type, and pricing group

template.name: Product Price Structure Report
template.description: Shows price structure of selected products as at a date with selection by name, type, and pricing group

template.name: Products Missing Prices for Pricing Group Report
template.description: Shows products where active prices have pricing groups, but not all pricing groups are specified
template.path: Reporting/Reports/Product/A4/Products Missing Prices for Pricing Group Report.jrxml

template.name: Stock Movement Report
template.description: Lists stock movements in specified date/time range during stocktake

template.name: Stock Reorder Report
template.description: Lists what should be ordered from specified suppliers for specified stock locations

template.name: Stock Valuation Report
template.description: Shows stock valuation as at a given date for selected locations, products, types and classifications

template.name: Stocktake Export Report
template.description: Builds a spreadsheet for stocktaking products in a specified location

template.name: Stocktake List Report
template.description: Prints stocktake sheets for selected locations, products, and types

template.name: HL7 Messages Report
template.description: Lists HL7 messages in the specified period containing the specified text
